comments.body:
The header of this file contains the comment `clang-format is from the most recent version of LLVM supported by Scala Native`, but we're using the opposite. We should fix it as it might be misleading in the future. 
Besides this, it looks good to me. Although, I was surprised that we need to have a common clang-format version.

Thanks for the review. I have fixed up the comment. I was really surprised too that it would be so inconsistent between versions. I was hopeful we wouldn't need special setup and was surprised that older versions don't have the `--dry-run` option.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@IFS=$'\n\t'

# The required version of clang-format (matches minimum clang version) for CI
CLANG_FORMAT_VERSION=6
